page.title: 07MOBILE SHOPS
page.content: In our area four days a week a van comes round to the door selling meat, fish, milk, eggs and bread. They also sell in other villages. If people want to buy other things they would have to go in to Buntingford or Bishops Stortford. There is a post office in the back of the old vicerage which is open two afternoons a week. It is soon to be sold and the post office will move to the Star. The letters are delivered twice a day and you can give the postman letters as well. Newspapers are also delivered but not on Sunday. A library van comes round the village once a week and you can go inside and choose a book to borrow.
